skin.content:
<style>
  /* Topbar overrides */
  #f5Topbar i, #menuPreview i { color: {{f5main.param.topbar.menuIconColor}}; }
  #toolbarMail i, mailPreview i { color: {{f5main.param.topbar.mail.color}}; }
  #toolbarMail:hover i, mailPreview:hover i { color: {{f5main.param.topbar.mail.hover}}; }
  #toolbarSearch i, searchPreview i { color: {{f5main.param.topbar.search.color}}; }
  #toolbarSearch:hover i, searchPreview:hover i { color: {{f5main.param.topbar.search.hover}}; }
  #toolbarCustomize i, customizePreview i { color: {{f5main.param.topbar.customize.color}}; }
  #toolbarCustomize:hover i, customizePreview:hover i { color: {{f5main.param.topbar.customize.hover}}; }
  /* Loader animation */
  #loader-wrapper { background-color: {{f5main.param.site.loader.wrapper}}; }
  #loader { border-top-color: {{f5main.param.site.loader.color1}}; }
  #loader:before { border-top-color: {{f5main.param.site.loader.color2}}; }
  #loader:after { border-top-color: {{f5main.param.site.loader.color3}}; }
</style>
